"Received <yellow>Photon Sphere<c> from Lucotte."
"Received <yellow>Excube<c> from Lucotte."
"Received <yellow>Lambda Grinder<c> from Lucotte."
"Received <yellow>Tri-Boost +50%<c> from Lucotte."
"Received <yellow>Great Grind Success +50%<c> from Lucotte."
"Received <yellow>Lambda Grinder x3<c> from Lucotte."
"Received <yellow>Ability Success Rate +30%<c> from Lucotte."
"Received <yellow>Tri-Boost +100%<c> from Lucotte."
"Received <yellow><%skit_text><c> from Lucotte."
"Oh, Master! Excellent timing. Please, come here."
"I would like to express my feelings towards you through my hospitality."
"You have been of great help to me, and I am most thankful for that."
"Master, I hope that the three of us see much more of you in the future!"
"Greetings, Master. I am fine, thank you."
"If you want to know about the Etoile class, you may ask me anything."
"Thanks to you, Etoile's name is spreading far and wide. Please convey my thanks to Stratos."
"I still have much to learn, but I want to promote Etoile as much as I reasonably can."
"Master, thank you for continuing to support me!"
"At last, the day has come when the three of us can be together again... I am deeply grateful to you!"
"You have led me to the future I have always dreamed of. You are the best Master I could hope to have!"
"Please allow me to serve you as your maid still. You shall have my gratitude for many years to come!"
"It seems I've returned at a difficult time."
"Please, use the power of Etoile as much as you require."
"As for me, I will do my best to help my Master!"
"Welcome back, Master."

"This was an unprecedented crisis...
I am honored to have been able to fight alongside everybody. Especially you, Master."
"With your permission, I shall hold a thank-you party for everyone, where I shall serve them tea and sweet baked treats!"

"キリトさま、ですわね。
マスターから、お話は伺っていますわ。
わたくしの経験から申し上げますと……"

"お相手を「知る」こと。
一手先を「読む」こと。
自分が「楽しむ」こと……"

"この３つが大切だと考えていますの。
どれが欠けても、いけませんわ。"

"なるほど……敵の強さを「知る」。
攻撃の一手先を「読む」。
そして戦いを「楽しむ」……か。"

"以上が、わたくしが
おもてなしに必要と考える
メイドの心得、ですわ。"

"め、メイドの心得……？
俺は「強くなるコツ」だと思って
聞いてたんだけど……"

"まあ！\u3000それは大変、失礼しました。
わたくし、てっきり「メイドのコツ」を
お伝えするものだとばかり……"

"メイドのコツの話をしていたのか……
でも、意外と参考になっちゃったな……
ありがとう、助かったよ。"
"キリト"
